labels.name: priority: high
labels.description: this issue breaks critical functionality - it must be adressed immediately

labels.name: priority: low
labels.description: this issue only has minor effects - adressing it is not immediately required

labels.name: priority: normal
labels.description: this issue does not break any critical functionality - it must be adressed, but not immediately

labels.name: status: confirmed
labels.description: this issue is reproducible or otherwise confirmed to exist

labels.name: status: scheduled
labels.description: the resolution of this issue is scheduled for the next release

labels.name: status: investigating
labels.description: this issue is not easily reproducible or fixable, the cause is being investigated

labels.name: status: invalid
labels.description: this issue is confirmed to not exist in any capacity

labels.name: status: wontfix
labels.description: this issue is confirmed, but will not be fixed

labels.name: type: bug
labels.description: this issue breaks or otherwise adversely affects functionality

labels.name: type: compatibility
labels.description: this issue is caused by a compatibility problem

labels.name: type: duplicate
labels.description: this issue reports the same problem as a different one

labels.name: type: documentation
labels.description: this issue requests additions or enhancements to documentation

labels.name: type: enhancement
labels.description: this issue requests additions or enhancements to the codebase

labels.name: type: question
labels.description: this issue asks a question and does not necessarily report a problem
